name: The Castle (itch) (joebain)
description:
In June 2018 I was on holiday with my girlfriend in Tuscany and we had a hire car so we could drive around and explore the area. I'm not a great driver or navigator and between us we managed to take a lot of wrong turns and get ourselves lost once or twice.

This is a short game (2-3 mins) about getting lost but not minding. Sometimes getting lost is just exploring a new area, enjoying what you discover, and realising that you'll probably get there in the end.

This game was made for the Meditations project and will be featured there on the 18th June but you can play it here now.
